com.group13.queries

Class Query

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.group13.queries.Query

  • public class Query
extends java.lang.Object
    Query contains methods to allow for executing queries to the database
    Author:
    Conner Theberge

    • Method Detail

      • constructSelect

        public static java.lang.String constructSelect(java.lang.String columnName,
                                               java.lang.String tableName,
                                               java.lang.String whereCondition)
        Constructs a select statement.
        Use executeSelect(String) to execute the constructed statement.
        Parameters:
        columnName - The name of the column to select
        tableName - The table to select from
        whereCondition - The where statement for specific selection (Ex: ID = selectID)
        Returns:
        The constructed statement as a string

      • constructSelect

        public static java.lang.String constructSelect(java.lang.String columnName,
                                               java.lang.String tableName)
        Constructs a select statement.
        Use executeSelect(String) to execute the constructed statement.
        Parameters:
        columnName - The name of the column to select
        tableName - The table to select from
        Returns:
        The constructed statement as a string

      • constructInsert

        public static java.lang.String constructInsert(java.lang.String tableName,
                                               java.lang.String... insertValues)
        Constructs an insert statement.
        Use executeUpdate(String) to execute the constructed statement
        Parameters:
        tableName - The name of the table to insert into
        insertValues - The values to insert.
        Values are structured 1:1 with column name first, and actual value in the next argument
        Returns:
        The constructed statement as a string

      • constructDelete

        public static java.lang.String constructDelete(java.lang.String tableName,
                                               java.lang.String... whereConditions)
        Constructs a delete statement
        Use executeUpdate(String) to execute the constructed statement
        Parameters:
        tableName - The name of the table to delete from
        whereConditions - The where statements for specific deletion (Ex: ID = selectID)
        Returns:
        The constructed statement

      • executeSelect

        public static java.sql.ResultSet executeSelect(java.lang.String query)
        Executes a select statement.
        Cannot execute any statements that would update the database.
        Parameters:
        query - The query statement to execute
        Returns:
        The ResultSet resulting from the select. Null on error.

      • executeUpdate

        public static int executeUpdate(java.lang.String query)
        Executes an update statement.
        Cannot execute any statements that would select from the database.
        Parameters:
        query - The query statement to execute
        Returns:
        The number of rows in the database affected.
